creator: bbondi@comcast.net
text:
The section of the .conf file I am worried about is:
<Directory />
    Options FollowSymLinks
    AllowOverride None
</Directory>

I am far from an expert, but, I thought tags like: <aTag /> were both open and 
close tags. Therefore values after the <Directory /> would not be processed.


Thanks for your time,
Bob

creator: mads@apache.org
text:
Ehrm, no - this is not xml, it is an Apache config directive.
<Directory /> is a Directory section applying to the / directory.
Please read just the basic documentation and ask questions on the
http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users users mailing list.
Bugzilla is only for reporting bugs.
Thanks for using Apache.
